ReportingÂ¶

A comprehensive Reporting feature is due to be fully integrated into the PMHC MDS in Stage_Two of the PMHC MDS development.

We plan to release some basic reporting features prior to the implementation of Departmental Reports. An update will be circulated to all current users and the mailing list when new reports are added.

Once this feature is available, you will only be able to see the Reporting tab if you have been assigned the ‘Reporting’ role.

In the interim, PMHC MDS users with the reporting role can access their organisation’s current PMHC MDS data through the Data Extraction tab - see Data Extraction.
